origin.toomanyorigins.dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
origin.toomanyorigins.dragonborn.descrip: Half Human, Half Dragon. Whilst they lack the teleportation abilities of the Enderian, their ferocious breath and structure makes the inhabitants of The End bow before them.
origin.toomanyorigins.hisskin.name: Hiss-kin
origin.toomanyorigins.hisskin.descriptio: Many people have constant debates on whether or not this creature truly exists. It is said in mythology that this evolutionary path of creeper learned to control their explosions as to not harm the environment around them as a get-away tactic.
origin.toomanyorigins.undead.name: Undead
origin.toomanyorigins.undead.description: A rare genetic mutation allows this race to keep their humanity despite suffering the effects of the Infection.
origin.toomanyorigins.withered.name: Withered
origin.toomanyorigins.withered.descripti: The Withered are those whose ancestors have paid the price for harnessing the chaotic power of the Wither. They can feel the decay within spread to anything they touch.
power.toomanyorigins.dragon_breath.name: Draconic Breath
power.toomanyorigins.dragon_breath.descr: You're able to conjure a ball of armour-piercing draconic flame that leaves a lingering cloud wherever it lands. It can also act as fuel for furnaces.
power.toomanyorigins.no_knockback.name: Solidity
power.toomanyorigins.no_knockback.descri: Your dominant body negates all knockback.
power.toomanyorigins.weak_point.name: Weak Point
power.toomanyorigins.weak_point.descript: You have a vulnerable spot, making you take more damage from projectiles.
power.toomanyorigins.zenith_scales.name: Zenith Scales
power.toomanyorigins.zenith_scales.descr: You have 2 more hearts of health than humans.
death.attack.dragonMagic.player: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.dragonMagic.player.item: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.indirectDragonMagic: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath by %2$s
death.attack.indirectDragonMagic.item: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath by %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.overheat.name: Overheat
power.toomanyorigins.overheat.descriptio: You can rocket jump away from any object you're looking at. This sets your inner gunpowder on fire harming you in the process.
power.toomanyorigins.blast_immunity.name: Blast Resistant Hide
power.toomanyorigins.blast_immunity.desc: You are immune to all forms of explosive damage.
power.toomanyorigins.conductor.name: Conductor
power.toomanyorigins.conductor.descripti: When struck by lightning, you become charged.
power.toomanyorigins.sneaking_steps.name: Sneaking Steps
power.toomanyorigins.sneaking_steps.desc: As you are used to sneaking up on your prey, you move slightly slower.
power.toomanyorigins.ailurophobia.name: Ailurophobia
power.toomanyorigins.ailurophobia.descri: Being near cats or ocelots weakens and makes you slower.
death.attack.overheat.player: %1$s incinerated their insides whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.overheat.player.item: %1$s incinerated their insides whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.deathly_bite.name: Deathly Bite
power.toomanyorigins.deathly_bite.descri: Your melee attacks inflict a Zombifying effect on non undead mobs for a short time. Hitting any villager that has this effect zombifies them.
power.toomanyorigins.no_helmet_burn.name: Husk of a Former Self
power.toomanyorigins.no_helmet_burn.desc: After 1 minute and 30 seconds of spawning in you burn in sunlight unless headwear is worn.
power.toomanyorigins.cannibalism.name: Cannibalism
power.toomanyorigins.cannibalism.descrip: Rotten Flesh is more nutritious for you.
power.toomanyorigins.opposite_day.name: Opposite Day
power.toomanyorigins.opposite_day.descri: Instant Health and Instant Damage have the reverse effect. You are also immune to Regeneration, Hunger and Zombifying.
power.toomanyorigins.torn_lungs.name: Torn Lungs
power.toomanyorigins.torn_lungs.descript: You exhaust much quicker than others, thus requiring you to eat more.
death.attack.zombification.player: %1$s rotted away whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.zombification.player.item: %1$s rotted away whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.black_thumb.name: Black Thumb
power.toomanyorigins.black_thumb.descrip: You spread decay to any overworld crops you plant, making them unable to grow.
You have one extra level of Soul Speed at all times.
power.toomanyorigins.soul_shield.name: Soul Shield
power.toomanyorigins.soul_shield.descrip: When you are at 50% of your maximum health or below, you create a soul projection around yourself, making yourself more resistant to damage and immune to projectiles.
power.toomanyorigins.wither_immunity.des: You are immune to the Wither effect.
power.toomanyorigins.wither_toxins.name: Wither Toxins
power.toomanyorigins.wither_toxins.descr: Your melee attacks inflict the Wither effect for a short time.
